eventlist:
<https://flatisjustice.moe/eventlist>
General: Enter ship levels/export to kanmusu list -> Copy the code in the box at top (starts with `.2|`) -> Paste in text box on site linked above -> Press enter/select wanted image
For KC3: Strategy room -> Ship list -> Click on `Export to: kanmusu_list` at bottom of filter box -> See general
For EO: Right click fleet name in fleet panel -> Click on `Copy Ship List (kancolle-calc)` -> See general
cache:
**KCCacheProxy**: <https://github.com/Tibowl/KCCacheProxy/releases/>
**Full/differential cache dumps **(optional): <https://mega.nz/#F!sOwClABa!yHldyYZr2MBqhTNYEupztg>

**Installation video**: <90s video showing how to install (& setup for Chrome) <https://youtu.be/Dog1zKAAWeI>
**Installation **(v2 or later, windows): Get latest setup exe from releases, open it, set browser/viewer proxy to localhost:8081 (see <https://github.com/Tibowl/KCCacheProxy/wiki/Installation-and-setup#browserviewer-setup> for more information).
**Using full/differential cache dumps** (optional): See <https://github.com/Tibowl/KCCacheProxy/wiki/Installation-and-setup#using-cache-dumps>
**Upgrading to v2 from v1.x**: Delete any auto-startup things, install v2 like usual (see above), set cache path to old cache folder (don't forget to save, can be moved first if wanted). Other files from old version can be deleted.
**More information**: <https://github.com/Tibowl/KCCacheProxy/wiki>
gotsheep:
The gotsheep minigame can be started in the item menu, by clicking on the three flowers.
Flick the sheep to move it. To advance to the next phase you need to meet a point requirement. 
At the end of every wave you get one Shuusui, these stack, so use them when you can't meet point requirement / during final round.
There are 5 waves:
```
Wave | Border | Time | Score/E. | E. Size | E. Hits Required
1    |   2500 |   30 |       10 |      70 | 250
2    |   5000 |   35 |       20 |     100 | 250
3    |  15000 |   40 |       40 |      80 | 375
4    |  50000 |   45 |       80 |      90 | 625
5    |  70000 |   50 |      100 |     120 | 700
```
To get an S rank, you'll need to reach wave 5 and get 70000 points.

Example of S rank playthrough; <https://youtu.be/tERzplgdU1U>
